DOC.brief_summary: The aim experiment test pharmacodynamics pharmacokinetics insulin analog dependence external physiological alteration . The investigator plan compare pharmacodynamics insulin analog delivery regular condition presence increase perfusion delivery site , achieve way local warming , movement topical application Capsaicin cream . The investigator also test effect local heating topical application Capsaicin cream post prandial glucose level follow bolus .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Heating Massaging Vibrating Vicinity Insulin Delivery Site
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participant age 18 65 year old 2 . Type I Type II diabetes 3 . HbA1c 612 % 4 . Does suffer sever hypertension , kidney , liver heart disease 5 . Does suffer active Ischemic heart disease 6 . Is willing sign consent form 1 . Participants age < 18 > 65 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Breast feeding woman 4 . Uncontrolled diabetes , HbA1c value > 12 % range 5 . Suffers active Ischemic heart disease 6 . Alcohol addiction 7 . Is prepared sign informed consent
